title: Khloe Kardashian discovers Kris Jenner lied to her after reading ex-husband Lamar Odom's memoir
text:
Khloe Kardashian's tumultuous relationship with ex-husband Lama Odom was thrust back into the spotlight when the two-time NBA champion released his autobiography, Darkness To Light, earlier this year.

And now it appears the memoir may have has unearthed some major drama between Khloe and her mother, Kris Jenner.

In a new teaser for the upcoming episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians, Khloe revealed that she found out her mom, who also serves as her manager, lied to her by reading Odom's book.

Revelation: Khloe Kardashian revealed that she found out that her mother Kris Jenner lied to her by reading ex-husband Lamar Odom's autobiography

In the quick clip shared on E! News, the Revenge Body star can be seen telling her sister, Kylie Jenner, that 'Lamar is writing a book' and that she uncovered something very surprising.

'In the book, I found out that mom's lying to me,' she said, while looking visibly upset.

It's still not clear exactly what Kris lied about, but the momager could then be heard saying, 'I'm trying to do damage control,' along with video of her scrolling through her phone.

The teaser wraps up in dramatic fashion in a later scene, with Scott Disick conveying how worried he thinks Kris is after the revelation.

'She literally thinks you’re gonna, like, come for her,' he said to Khloe, which prompted her to respond, 'Guess what? I am.'

The former couple had a whirlwind romance that made headlines when they were married in September 2009, just one month after they met for the first time at a party.

In his memoir, the retired basketball player admitted he struggled with drug use during their marriage and that he cheated on his wife a number of times.

'If there is one thing I regret when I was married, it was having multiple affairs with different women,' Odom told Us Weekly.

The former LA Laker also confessed to forcefully grabbing his ex-wife and threatening her while he was high on drugs.

'You trying to embarrass me in front of my friends? I'll f***ing kill you! You don't know what I'm capable of!' he once yelled at her after she came into his room one night, in what he now calls 'the most regrettable moment' in his life.

After months of media speculation, Khloe filed for divorce in December 2013, but she withdrew the documents after Odom was found unconscious in a Nevada brothel so that she could make medical decisions on his behalf.

Even though they appeared to reconcile during his rehabilitation, they eventually finalized the divorce in December 2016.

More will be revealed about the rift between Khloe and Kris in the next episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians on Sunday, October 27.
